name: It is just a dream.
description:
Game I made in 7 days for the 7th official Brackeys Game Jam.

Instructions:
  • Move with the arrows or  a / d 
  • Press s to toggle between sleep and awake.
  • The more time you remain in the dream, the more time it takes to wake up.
  • When awake:
    • You can't fly or jump.
    • If you die you will go back at the start of the level.
  • When sleeping:
    • You can fly with  space  or  up 
    • If you die you will wake up.
  • Tip: If you can't pass, the way may be somewhere else.

Hope you like my game, if so: leave a comment in french Spanish or English.

A game by:

Development: Rafael Martienz Calvo.

Art: Ana Martienz Calvo.
